channel.title: How to change a server ip from Localhost to .... .no-ip.biz ? or servegame?
channel.description: Hey need help i downloaded no-ip and maked a ip Mitchelpkz.servegame.com but it doesnt works i need to log in with ip Localhost.. how to let it works? Ty :confused: ;)

item.title: How to change a server ip from Localhost to .... .no-ip.biz ? or servegame?
item.dc:creator: @i_ownd_u_i i ownd u i
item.description:
@i_ownd_u_i wrote:

How to change a server ip from Localhost to .... .no-ip.biz ? or servegame?
  1. go to www.no-ip.com
  • download no-ip duc
  • read instructions to set it up
  • then make a no-ip.biz or no-ip.org ( etc )
  1. portfowarding
  • linex router
  • type this into your internet bar ( 192.168.1.1 )
  • User is ( blank ) and pass is ( admin )
  1. setting up server
  • once your on ( 192.168.1.1 )
  • click the tab that says ( gameing )
  1. cmd
  • open up start button in bottom left hand corner of your screen
  • open search
  • type in cmd
  • then open it
  • once you have opened it then type in ( ipconfig ) into your cmd scroll down till you find your ip
  1. back to web
  • type in your ( ip ) into the box that says ( 192.168.1. [ ] ) in the [ ] type the last 3 numbers of your ip in there
  • then save and continue

once you have done that regisgter it on moparscape

hope i helped

Read full topic
item.source: How to change a server ip from Localhost to .... .no-ip.biz ? or servegame?

item.title: How to change a server ip from Localhost to .... .no-ip.biz ? or servegame?
item.dc:creator: @508_Client 508_Client
item.description:
@508_Client wrote:

[quote=“Rogueclue, post:1, topic:232773”]Hey need help
i downloaded no-ip and maked a ip Mitchelpkz.servegame.com
but it doesnt works
i need to log in with ip Localhost…
how to let it works?
Ty ;)[/quote]

Try these:
Are your ports forwarded?
Make sure you checked the little box next to Mitchelpkz.servegame.com inside your no-ip

buckybkatt:

you log into your server on your computer with localhost (127.0.0.1, 0.0.0.0) but other people log in with Mitchelpkz.servegame.com

anybody can, even the hoster, so it’s obviously an issue.

Read full topic
